Sacrifice this artifact: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

Equipped creature gets +1/+1.

cards.rules_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each differently named land you control.
Stella’s Journal enters with X page counters on it.
At the beginning of your end step, if you have fewer cards in hand than the number of page counters on Stella’s Journal, draw cards equal to the difference.

{T}: Add {C}.
If a spell or ability you control would produce {C}, you may pay 1 life. If you do, it produces {B} instead.

{T}: Add {C}.
If a spell or ability you control would produce {C}, you may pay 1 life. If you do, it produces {W} instead.

{T}: Add {C}.
If a spell or ability you control would produce {C}, you may pay 1 life. If you do, it produces {U} instead.

{T}: Add {C}.
If a spell or ability you control would produce {C}, you may pay 1 life. If you do, it produces {R} instead.

{T}: Add {C}.
If a spell or ability you control would produce {C}, you may pay 1 life. If you do, it produces {G} instead.

Pristine Grounds enters tapped unless you control no other lands.
{T}: Add one mana of any type Pristine Grounds hasn’t produced this game. [i](The types of mana are {C}, {W}, {U}, {B}, {R}, and {G}.)[/i]

Draw a card. When you do, pay for and choose any number.
+{U} — Return target spell you don’t control to its owner’s hand. That player draws a card.
+{R} — Target player discards all the cards in their hand, then draws that many cards.
+{G} — Target player may put a land card from their hand or graveyard onto the battlefield.

Create a 3/1 red Dinosaur creature token. When you do, pay for and choose any number.
+{G} — Put a trample counter on target creature you control.
+{U} — Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
+{R} — Put a haste counter on target creature you control.

Exile target creature, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner’s control. When you do, pay for and choose any number.
+{W} — Distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two creatures you control.
+{C} — Exile that creature again. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner’s control at the beginning of the next end step.
+{B} — All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

Create a Solidarity token. When you do, pay for and choose any number. [i](A Solidarity token is an enchantment with “Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.”)[/i]
+{R} — Edgeland Pledge deals 2 damage to any target.
+{U} — Tap up to three target creatures.
+{G} — Create a 1/1 red Soldier creature token. It gains haste until end of turn.

Target player exiles a creature they control and the top card of their library. When they exile cards this way, pay for and choose any number.
+{B} — Each player exiles a card from their hand.
+{W} — Exile any player’s graveyard. You gain 1 life for each card type among cards exiled this turn.
+{C} — Each opponent loses 1 life for each card type among cards exiled this turn.
cards.notes:
!canoncard profane command
 adjusted: {C} mode changed from ’Copy a card exiled this turn with mana value 3 or less. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. If you do, discard a card.’

cards.rules_text:
Create a token that’s a copy of target creature you control, except it’s a 1/1. When you do, pay for and choose any number.
+{C} — That token becomes a copy of a different target creature.
+{W} — You gain life equal to the number of creatures you control.
+{B} — Each player sacrifices a creature.
